mapper.select: SELECT FOLDER_ID as folderId, FOLDER_NAME as folderName,FOLDER_LEAVE AS folderLeave, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PERSONAL_FILE_FOLDER TMP WHERE TMP.FOLDER_ID=folderId)=0 then 'false' else 'true' END AS isParent FROM PERSONAL_FILE_FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_LEAVE=#{folderLeave} AND CREATE_USER=#{accountId} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) AS ZS FROM PERSONAL_FILE_FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_LEAVE=#{folderLeave} AND CREATE_USER=#{createUser} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId}
SELECT FOLDER_ID AS folderId,FOLDER_NAME AS folderName FROM PERSONAL_FILE_FOLDER WHERE ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND FOLDER_LEAVE = #{folderLeave} AND CREATE_USER = #{createUser}

SELECT FOLDER_ID as folderId, FOLDER_NAME as folderName,FOLDER_LEAVE AS folderLeave,'true' AS isParent FROM PERSONAL_FILE_FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_LEAVE=#{folderLeave} AND CREATE_USER=#{accountId} AND ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
